# Installation  {#install}

`saemix` can be installed and used on several platforms. Installation can range from easy to challenging, depending on the platform. We are in the process of streamlining this process, and any help or suggestions are greatly appreciated!



<!-- CRAN -->

## `CRAN`
You can either install the package directly from your R console

```
install.packages("saemix")
```

<!-- Github -->
## `Github`: Build from source
You can also build it from Github using the R package "devtools"

```
library("devtools")

install_github("saemixdevelopment/saemix" )

library(saemix)
```
